changelog.change: Tabs added to the Settings menu allowing further customization of the different states the timer can be in (Running, Not Running, Paused, Ended).
Added two more custom options, %time and %inherit.
Added the option to clear Discord activity if the timer is not running.
Added %category_detailed as a custom option, allowing you to display the category name along with any variables.
Added %comparison as a custom option, allowing you to display your current comparison.
Cleaned up some of the code.
Fixed issue where if a delta did not exist (i.e comparing against Nothing or brand new splits), the application would freeze. (Thanks SurprisedPika!).
Rebuilt Component from essentially the ground up, should be a lot more stable.
Customization options in the settings menu, such as the ability to toggle the Elapsed time and change all the text.
